UnitOfMeasure.description: The UnitOfMeasure object cannot be null and cannot be an empty object.

MeasureName.description:
Maps to the field UnitsOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureId in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

MeasureDescription.description:
Maps to the field UnitsOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasureDescription in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed

MeasurePrintText.description:
Maps to the field UnitsOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasurePrintText in your WinMan database.
Null values: not allowed
Empty strings: not allowed
